thread.title: Steven Van Zandt, Paul Shaffer sign on to Bert Berns show
thread.title_full: Steven Van Zandt, Paul Shaffer sign on to Bert Berns show

title: Steven Van Zandt, Paul Shaffer sign on to Bert Berns show
text:
> Entertainment Steven Van Zandt, Paul Shaffer sign on to Bert Berns show FILE - In this Oct. 14, 2014 file photo, bandleader Paul Shaffer attends the premiere of HBO's "Foo Fighters Sonic Highway" in New York. Shaffer and Steven Van Zandt have signed on to produce the jukebox musical “Piece of My Heart: The Bert Berns Story,” aiming for Broadway next year. (Photo by Andy Kropa/Invision/AP, File) The most compelling, sharable stories from across the web.
